name: Escape Mind
description:
Escape Mind is a Point & Click game and Escape Room.
It has 15 rooms and 5 difficult puzzles to solve with magic touches, animations and pixel art graphics.

You just woke up in an abandoned house and the last thing you remember was chasing a little rabbit.
Find a way to escape by solving the puzzles ahead, use the collected items to help solving the secrets.

Time to relax, use logical reasoning and arouse the detective within you.



Can you escape?
Have fun.
